parts.stem:
The table below shows the number of different types of rooms in three hotels owned by a company.

HotelSingle RoomDouble RoomSuite
First hotel 45 74 15
Second hotel 48 74 19
Third hotel 49 94 10

All three hotels charge an equal amount for a room of the same size. When all the rooms are booked, the company’s daily incomes from the first, second, and third hotels are 50,120 LE, 53,560 LE, and 55,660 LE respectively. Find the daily income from a suite.
